translation.en: [narrator] It begins like this.
Two billion years ago, an amoeba.
translation.fr: Il y a deux milliards d'années, une amibe.

translation.en: Wait, let's... Let's back up. I've skipped too many connections.
translation.fr: Non, on reprend. J'ai sauté trop de connexions.

translation.en: Out of nothing, in an instant... everything.
translation.fr: Il n'y avait rien, et en un instant... tout.

translation.en: An infinite cosmic orgy of matter and energy,
translation.fr: Une orgie cosmique infinie de matière et d'énergie

translation.en: rubbing, bumping, and grinding together.
translation.fr: qui se frottent, se touchent et fusionnent.

translation.en: There would be no galaxies, no suns, no planets,
translation.fr: Il n'y aurait ni galaxies, ni soleils, ni planètes,

translation.en: no life without collisions of heavenly bodies.
translation.fr: ni vie, sans collision de corps célestes.

translation.en: Back to our amoeba.
It engulfs a bacterium with unique powers, and... voilà...
translation.fr: Elle absorbe une bactérie aux pouvoirs uniques... et voilà.

translation.en: Earth's first photosynthesis-enabled organism.
translation.fr: Premier organisme capable de photosynthèse sur Terre.

translation.en: Maybe it was chance.
Maybe it was inevitable.
This one changed amoeba
becomes the ancestor of every living plant on Earth,
translation.fr: est l'ancêtre de toutes les plantes sur Terre,

translation.en: which in turn floods the planet with oxygen...
paving the way for every other form of life we know,
leading to more souls, more connections,
and therefore more new worlds branching outward from the first.
translation.fr: et des ramifications de mondes nouveaux .

translation.en: These forces of nature, when they converge,
translation.fr: Ces forces de la nature lorsqu'elles convergent,

translation.en: be they astronomical collisions, biological unions,
translation.fr: par collision astronomique ou union biologique,

translation.en: demonstrate the infinite potential of our connections.
translation.fr: démontrent le potentiel infini de nos connexions.

translation.en: This truth also extends to the human heart.
translation.fr: Cette vérité s'applique aussi au cœur humain.

translation.en: Pack of Stuttons.
No offense, but how are you gonna pay for these?
I'm gonna use an ad Buddy to cover this purchase.
translation.fr: Je vais utiliser un ad Buddy pour cet achat.

translation.en: Those assholes record client conversations.
translation.fr: Ces salauds enregistrent les conversations des clients.

translation.en: National Database of Desires. The businessmen, ever hear of it?
translation.fr: Les patrons de la Base de données nationale des désirs ?

translation.en: They know you better than you know you.
-Okay. -It's not a conspiracy,
just a conspiracy theory.
[narrator] Hypothesis:
all souls are on a quest to connect.
translation.fr: les âmes sont en quête de connexion.

translation.en: Corollary:
our minds have no awareness of this quest.
translation.fr: nos esprits ne sont pas conscients de cette quête.

translation.en: Did you know that most quarters have been swallowed and defecated by a human?
translation.fr: La plupart ont été avalées et déféquées par un humain.

translation.en: [narrator] Hypothesis: all the worlds that almost were
translation.fr: Hypothèse : tous les mondes qui ont presque existé

translation.en: matter just as much as the world we're in.
translation.fr: comptent autant que celui dans lequel on vit.

translation.en: Corollary:
these hidden worlds cause us great pain.
translation.fr: ces mondes cachés nous font souffrir.

translation.en: [man] ...no wallet, no shoes.
No idea how I even really got to Poland in the first place.
translation.fr: Je ne sais même pas comment je suis arrivé en Pologne.

translation.en: Bro, I'm telling you,
this was seriously such a crazy situation.
Th... From Poland... I was in...
I had no idea... I had no idea how I got there.
translation.fr: Je ne savais pas... comment j'étais arrivé là.

translation.en: [narrator] Camaraderie, communion,
family, friendship, love, what have you.
We're lost without connection.
[audio billboard] ...long-distance relationships are tough. Thank you, Friend Proxy.
[narrator] It's quite terrible... to be alone.
Put simply, my goal is to eradicate all...
translation.fr: Pour faire simple, mon but est d'éradiquer...

translation.en: unnecessary and inefficient forms of human pain.
translation.fr: toute forme inefficace et inutile de douleur humaine.

translation.en: Forever.
We must evolve past our suffering.
It's trash, not a handout. Let's move it.
translation.fr: C'est des poubelles, pas un don. Circulez.

translation.en: What are you, a cop?
Not much of a difference authority-wise. Let's go.
translation.fr: La différence est mince, question autorité. Allez.

translation.en: [narrator] My research into this matter is... of course, ongoing.
translation.fr: Ma recherche dans ce domaine est... bien sûr, en cours.

translation.en: [man] The witness has already been sworn in.
translation.fr: Le témoin a déjà prêté serment.

translation.en: Mr. Milgrim, can you state for the court
your relationship with the defendant, Mr. Jed Milgrim?
translation.fr: votre relation avec l'accusé, M. Jed Milgrim.

translation.en: He's, um...
-He's my brother. -[man] Thank you.
Have you ever been arrested?
-No. -[man] Are you married?
-No. -[man] Children?
No.
[man] And can you tell us about the psychotic break
translation.fr: Pouvez-vous nous parler de la crise psychotique

translation.en: that you experienced roughly ten years ago?
translation.fr: que vous avez vécue il y a dix ans ?

translation.en: -Really? -[man] I'm just asking.
That's how they're gonna start? Dad, come on.
translation.fr: Ils vont commencer par ça ? Sérieux, papa.

translation.en: It doesn't necessarily mean that it'll be like that in the trial, Owen,
translation.fr: Ça ne va pas forcément se passer comme ça durant le procès, Owen,

translation.en: but, uh, sometimes prosecutors, they...
They try, uh, atypical inroads...
to crack you.
That's why we, uh... We have to prep for the unexpected.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça qu'on doit se préparer à tout.

translation.en: Can you resume, please?
Have you ever been hospitalized for mental illness?
translation.fr: Avez-vous été hospitalisé pour maladie mentale ?

translation.en: Yes, ten years ago.
translation.fr: Oui, il y a dix ans.

translation.en: Please explain what happened.
translation.fr: Veuillez expliquer ce qui s'est passé.

translation.en: [Owen] I was hospitalized...
and medicated...
and...
that was the last episode I had.
translation.fr: c'est la dernière crise que j'ai eue.

translation.en: Wasn't the nature of this psychosis delusional?
That you sometimes thought you saw your brother when he wasn't there?
translation.fr: Vous croyiez, à tort, voir votre frère ?

translation.en: [Owen] Not exactly.
Just say no.
Then what was the nature of this psychosis?
translation.fr: Alors quelle en était la nature ?

translation.en: [sighs] Owen, don't you think that your mental illness
translation.fr: Owen, ne pensez-vous pas que votre maladie mentale

translation.en: should disqualify you from testifying as a witness on your brother's behalf?
translation.fr: vous disqualifie comme témoin à décharge de votre frère ?

translation.en: Look, there's only one question here that really matters.
translation.fr: Une seule question est vraiment importante ici.

translation.en: Owen, do you know what is real?
translation.fr: Owen, tu sais ce qui est réel ?

translation.en: One hundred percent.
I'm compos mentis.
[woman] Welcome to New York.
And this is Statue of Extra Liberty.
translation.fr: Voici la statue de la Liberté en plus.

translation.en: Statue of Extra Liberty. Okay.
translation.fr: Statue de la Liberté en plus.

translation.en: [man] How'd the trial prep go for a naughty brother?
translation.fr: On te prépare à témoigner pour le vilain frère ?

translation.en: Did you tell 'em about me?
translation.fr: Tu leur as parlé de moi ?

translation.en: You're not supposed to be here.
translation.fr: - T'es pas censé être là. - Bien.

translation.en: [man] Good. You're still using the code words,
translation.fr: - T'es pas censé être là. - Bien. Tu utilises toujours le code,

translation.en: even though I am technically invisible.
translation.fr: même si je suis techniquement invisible.

translation.en: Owen, this week must be a doozy for you, huh?
translation.fr: Cette semaine doit être bizarre pour toi, Owen.

translation.en: You thought you were rid of me, but I have new information.
translation.fr: Tu pensais te débarrasser de moi, mais j'ai des nouvelles.

translation.en: This time I know.
You've been chosen to save the world.
translation.fr: Tu es l'élu, pour sauver le monde.

translation.en: You're gonna be a hero.
I don't want this. I don't want it.
translation.fr: Je ne veux rien de tout ça.

translation.en: I don't want this.
The details of the mission will be delivered to you by an agent, a woman.
translation.fr: Les détails de la mission seront livrés par une agent.

translation.en: You'll know her when you see her, trust me.
translation.fr: Tu sauras quand tu la verras.

translation.en: Just make contact with her.
The pattern is the pattern.
She'll reach you for further instructions!
[yells] Don't fuck this up!
[automated voice] Welcome. Please make a selection to begin.
translation.fr: Bienvenue. Pour commencer, faites une sélection.

translation.en: You selected single ride.
translation.fr: Vous avez choisi un trajet simple.

translation.en: How will you pay?
You selected credit.
Please swipe now.
Declined. Insufficient funds.
Would you like to use an ad Buddy to add funds?
translation.fr: Voulez-vous utiliser un ad Buddy pour ajouter des fonds ?

translation.en: Yes or no?
Welcome.
translation.fr: MARRE D'ÊTRE ICI ? ALLER SIMPLE À PARTIR DE 1 799 $

translation.en: [Ad Buddy] Okay, Mr. Milgrim, I'm gonna need your attention.
"When tragedy strikes others,
it's sometimes hard to know what to do until now..." Owen.
"Daddy's Home. Consider becoming a temporary volunteer mail-order husband
translation.fr: Papa est à la Maison. Devenez mari bénévole temporaire sur catalogue

translation.en: and changing the lives of a heartbroken family in your region."
translation.fr: et changez la vie d'une famille brisée de la région."

translation.en: Okay, well, up next,
we got something called Neberdine Pharmaceuticals.
translation.fr: on a quelque chose des Laboratoires Neberdine.

translation.en: "Good afternoon, Owen.
Did you know that your rent comprises 87.2 percent of your annual income?"
translation.fr: Saviez-vous que votre loyer représente 87,2 % de votre revenu annuel ?"

translation.en: Is that actually true?
-I just moved into my own place. -[Ad Buddy] Manhattan these days...
I'm over in an underground warehouse unit.
translation.fr: Je vis au sous-sol d'un entrepôt.

translation.en: Hoboken.
-I actually live in Roosevelt Island. -Okay, well...
translation.fr: Je vis à Roosevelt Island. D'accord...

translation.en: Uh, let's see. Oh-ho-ho.
"A catastrophic interruption in your professional life,
like a furlough, could ruin you.
translation.fr: tel un chômage technique vous ruinerait.

translation.en: Ever thought about supplementing your income with pharmaceutical testing?"
translation.fr: Et si vous complétiez vos revenus grâce aux essais cliniques ?"

translation.en: Friend Proxy.
"Tired of spending your time and energy making friends?"
translation.fr: "Marre de perdre du temps à fraterniser ?"

translation.en: [sales rep] And that is why Daddy's Home is happy to welcome you, Mr. Milgrim.
translation.fr: Papa est à la Maison vous accueille volontiers, M. Milgrim.

translation.en: [Owen] And I'd have to cover relocation costs?
translation.fr: Je couvre les frais de déménagement ?

translation.en: [sales rep] And inherit any potential debt of the deceased.
translation.fr: Et vous héritez des dettes du défunt.

translation.en: That doesn't make sense.
[sales rep] So, that's a yes?
To what?
[sales rep] It makes perfect sense.
-We are offering you heroism. -[man] So this is your office area.
translation.fr: - Vous seriez un héros. - C'est votre bureau.

translation.en: Again, it's a question of commitment.
[Owen] Your ad is misleading,
'cause you refer to it as a volunteer opportunity,
translation.fr: vous parlez d'une offre de bénévolat,

translation.en: but in the end I'd have to pay.
translation.fr: mais au final, je dois payer.

translation.en: [sales rep] But think about what you'd be getting. -A wife, lonely, in need. -[Owen] Yeah.
translation.fr: Mais pensez à ce qui vous attend. Une femme seule dans le besoin.

translation.en: [Owen] Uh, I have to go.
[man] Rozo did the anonymous hammerhead from the top down
translation.fr: Rozo a fait un audit de la société

translation.en: and came back with a 12-bullet short-termer.
translation.fr: et a établi une liste de 12 employés à congédier.

translation.en: -When? -[man] Well, they randomized the pattern.
We've sent out 30 memos on it since this morning.
translation.fr: On a envoyé 30 notes à ce sujet ce matin.

translation.en: Um, so this furlough, how long does it last?
translation.fr: Ce chômage technique va durer combien de temps ?

translation.en: -It's temporary. -[Owen] Right.
So... when am I back?
Oh, I don't know. I was kidding. It's probably permanent.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas. Je plaisantais. C'est sûrement permanent.

translation.en: I was using your kind of humor,
when you say something you don't mean and nobody laughs.
translation.fr: quand tu dis un truc sans le penser et que personne ne rit.

translation.en: It's... Yeah, it's okay. I'll just...
translation.fr: Ça va aller. Je vais juste...

translation.en: I'll just dip into my savings.
Oh, okay.
Bye.
[man] Okay, Owen.
-Do you know what I want to do? -[Owen] Yes.
translation.fr: - Tu sais ce que je veux faire ? - Oui.

translation.en: [man] Are you sure you know what I want to do?
[Owen] Yes.
[man] The way this deprogramming works, it's not an overnight fix.
translation.fr: La déprogrammation n'a pas lieu du jour au lendemain.

translation.en: You have to listen to it like a mantra.
translation.fr: Il faut l'écouter, comme un mantra.

translation.en: If you start feeling paranoid, you play this tape right away, okay?
translation.fr: Si tu te sens paranoïaque, écoute cette cassette, d'accord ?

translation.en: [Owen] Okay.
[man] Now, stop me when I say something that's not true.
translation.fr: Arrête-moi si ce que je dis est faux.

translation.en: The world sends you messages.
[Owen] Yes.
[man] Words are often code words,
or pass phrases for important secrets.
[Owen] Yes.
[man] You're visited by a brother no one else in your family is aware of.
translation.fr: Un frère invisible te rend visite.

translation.en: A facsimile of your brother Jed.
translation.fr: La copie conforme de ton frère Jed.

translation.en: -[Owen] Yes. -[man] He sends you messages.
Instructions for important missions you must accomplish.
translation.fr: Des instructions pour d'importantes missions à accomplir.

translation.en: [Owen] To see the deeper truth.
[man] He tells you you're meant to do something big,
translation.fr: Il dit que tu feras de grandes choses

translation.en: something that matters to the world,
and that you're not meant to do it alone.
translation.fr: et que tu ne les feras pas seul.

translation.en: All you need is a partner.
translation.fr: Il te faut juste un partenaire.

translation.en: [Owen] Yes. [audio billboard] You made a promise to me,
translation.fr: - Oui. - Tu m'as fait une promesse,

translation.en: and you made a promise to yourself.
translation.fr: et tu t'es fait une promesse.

translation.en: You promised we'd golf together in Hilton Head.
translation.fr: La promesse qu'on golferait ensemble à Hilton Head.

translation.en: [man] You sense danger all around you, but you stay disciplined.
translation.fr: Tu ressens du danger autour de toi, mais tu restes calme.

translation.en: A fight's coming.
Something even bigger than this world.
translation.fr: Quelque chose qui dépasse ce monde.

translation.en: Possibly extending to multiple galaxies.
translation.fr: Qui s'étend à de nombreuses galaxies.

translation.en: -[elevator] Fourth floor. Thank you. -[Owen] Yes.
Hello, Mrs. Finkelstein.
Fuck off, Donovan.
It's, uh, Owen.
-Owen Milgrim... -[Finkelstein] Fuck off, Donovan.
translation.fr: - Owen Milgrim... - Fous le camp, Donovan.

translation.en: Never mind.
Good.
Does it feel good to be heard?
[man] Does it feel good to know that you're not alone with this information?
translation.fr: De ne pas être seul à détenir cette information ?

translation.en: [Owen] Yeah.
[man] Will you complete your mission?
[Owen] Maybe.
[man] Am I a trusted messenger?
[Owen] Yes.
[man] Good. Then here are your real instructions.
translation.fr: Voilà les vraies instructions. QUE DU BONHEUR

translation.en: Repeat after me.
There is no pattern.
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas de schéma.

translation.en: [Owen] There is no pattern.
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas de schéma.

translation.en: [man] I am vulnerable, but I am not stupid.
translation.fr: Je suis vulnérable, mais pas stupide.

translation.en: [Owen] I'm vulnerable, but I'm not stupid.
translation.fr: Je suis vulnérable, mais pas stupide.

translation.en: But I will seek out the people in my life that care about me.
translation.fr: Je chercherai les gens qui se soucient de moi.

translation.en: [Owen] I will seek out the people in my life who care about me.
translation.fr: Je chercherai les gens qui se soucient de moi.

translation.en: I am not the chosen one.
[Owen] I am not the chosen one.
-The voices aren't real. -[clattering]
-[Owen] The voices aren't real. -The voices aren't real.
The voices are just noise.
-[Owen] The voices are just noise. -The voices are just noise.
I am just a guy with a vivid imagination.
[Owen] I'm just a guy with a vivid imagination.
I will most likely not be the savior of our galaxy.
translation.fr: Je ne serai sûrement pas le sauveur de notre galaxie.

translation.en: Hello?
[man, distorted] I've got a package from Neberdine Pharmaceutical Biotech
translation.fr: J'ai un paquet de la part des Laboratoires Neberdine Biotech

translation.en: for an Owen Milgrim.
What?
[man] I've got a package. Your name.
translation.fr: J'ai un paquet à votre nom.

translation.en: [woman] Hi, Owen. Did you get what I sent you?
translation.fr: - Allô ? - Bonjour, Owen. Vous avez reçu le colis ?

translation.en: [Owen] How did you...?
[woman] I've just been informed that you qualify as a hero candidate.
translation.fr: On me dit que vous remplissez les conditions du candidat héros.

translation.en: -What does that mean? -[woman] It's a term we use
for those who've been specifically selected for one of our studies.
translation.fr: les pré-sélectionnés pour l'un de nos essais.

translation.en: You're a very desirable individual to us, Owen.
translation.fr: Vous êtes un individu très intéressant pour nous.

translation.en: I've never seen B.N. over-ratios like this before.
translation.fr: Je n'avais jamais vu de tels sur-ratios BN.

translation.en: What does a hero candidate do? [woman] Exactly the things they were born to.
translation.fr: - Que fait un candidat héros ? - Ce pour quoi il est né.

translation.en: In your case, helping us treat maladies
translation.fr: Dans ce cas, aider à soigner des maladies,

translation.en: ranging from sluggishness and depression,
to I.B.S, to popcorn problems and irrational fears.
translation.fr: du côlon irritable aux problèmes de popcorn et aux peurs irrationnelles.

translation.en: "Popcorn problems"?
[woman] Prostate problems, yes.
Oh, I thought you...
[woman] We'll give you all the details when you come in.
translation.fr: Vous aurez tous les détails sur place.

translation.en: So, we'll see you on Monday?
♪ Someday you're gonna feel lonely ♪
translation.fr: Un jour tu vas te sentir seule

translation.en: ♪ Someday you're gonna feel blue ♪
translation.fr: Un jour tu n'auras pas le moral

translation.en: ♪ Someday you'll long for me only ♪
translation.fr: Un jour tu ne voudras que moi

translation.en: Good evening, Mr. Milgrim.
Everyone is on the patio for the recital.
translation.fr: Le récital se déroule dans le patio.

translation.en: Thank you.
♪ Someday you're gonna feel weary ♪
♪ You'll grieve when I'm far away ♪
translation.fr: Tu pleureras quand je serai loin

translation.en: ♪ Then you'll be missin' My huggin' and my kissin' ♪
translation.fr: Tu regretteras Mes câlins et mes baisers

translation.en: ♪ You'll remember what I say ♪
♪ You'll never know The good fellow I've been ♪
translation.fr: Tu verras L'homme bienveillant que je suis

translation.en: -♪ Until I've gone away ♪ -♪ Till I've gone away ♪ ♪ Gone away ♪
translation.fr: - Quand je serai parti - Quand je serai parti

translation.en: ♪ You're bound to miss The little things that I did ♪
translation.fr: Tu vas regretter Les attentions que j'avais

translation.en: -♪ I did ♪ -♪ For you each day ♪
translation.fr: - Pour toi chaque jour - Chaque jour

translation.en: -♪ You're gonna yearn ♪ -♪ You will be yearning ♪
-♪ For my returning ♪ -♪ For my returning ♪
translation.fr: - Que je revienne - Que je revienne

translation.en: -♪ You're bound to miss me ♪ -♪ You're bound to miss me ♪
translation.fr: - Je vais te manquer - Te manquer

translation.en: -♪ You'll long to kiss me ♪ -♪ You'll long to kiss me ♪
♪ You'll never know The good fellow I've been ♪
translation.fr: Tu verras L'homme bienveillant que je suis

translation.en: -♪ Until I've gone away ♪ -♪ Until I've gone away ♪
♪ Till I've gone away ♪
Where does she sleep when she stays over?
translation.fr: Elle dort où, quand elle reste dormir ?

translation.en: [Belle] This one?
Yeah, she's your sister, right?
Or is she a secret agent?
How did you know?
[whispering] Because I have super-secret sources
at a super-secret agency.
Don't tell anyone.
[whispers] Okay.
Supper's ready.
Okay, Mom.
I was completely baffled.
You know, I left for school.
Ernie was fine, and then, you know, the food was in the bowl.
translation.fr: Ernie allait bien, il avait à manger dans sa gamelle,

translation.en: The water was there, cage was locked up,
translation.fr: de l'eau, sa cage était fermée,

translation.en: and I get back from basketball practice,
-and he's just gone, absolutely... -The great gerbil escape artist.
translation.fr: - et il n'est plus là. - Le hamster, roi de l'évasion.

translation.en: -But he wasn't exactly fucking gone. -Language, Phil.
translation.fr: Il a disparu, mon cul ! - Phil ! - Bien vu.

translation.en: No, that's correct. He wasn't exactly fucking gone like that.
translation.fr: - Phil ! - Bien vu. Ton cul a du flair.

translation.en: -[Angelica] Language, Jed. -Where'd he go, O?
Maybe you shouldn't curse so much in front of the children.
translation.fr: Ne jurez pas devant les enfants. T'as bien entendu.

translation.en: -Ah, come on. Tell the rest. -[Angelica] This is not a farmyard, boys.
translation.fr: T'as bien entendu. On n'est pas à la ferme.

translation.en: So, um, I ask everyone, right?
Everyone's looking around the whole house, everyone frantic,
translation.fr: On fouille la maison dans tous les sens,

translation.en: and finally Owen, you know, eventually comes up
translation.fr: et Owen finit par se montrer,

translation.en: and brings me to his room...
How old were you then, Owen? Like, eight or somethin'?
translation.fr: T'avais quel âge, Owen ? Huit ans ?

translation.en: -Nine. -[Jed] Eight or nine, whatever. And he says-- He says,
translation.fr: - Neuf ans. - Peu importe. Et il dit :

translation.en: "Uh, I have to tell you somethin'. My-- My hawk ate Ernie."
translation.fr: "J'ai un truc à te dire. Ma buse a mangé Ernie."

translation.en: "What?" And he points over there,
and there's this big fuckin' red-tailed hawk
translation.fr: et je vois cette putain de buse

translation.en: sitting on his desk staring at me.
translation.fr: posée à son bureau qui me fixe.

translation.en: What eight-year-old has a fuckin' hawk?
translation.fr: Qui a une putain de buse à huit ans ?

translation.en: Uh, how did you have a hawk?
Um, I rescued it from the park.
translation.fr: Je l'ai sauvée dans le parc.

translation.en: I found it with a broken wing and brought it to my room and fed it.
translation.fr: Son aile était cassée, je l'ai nourrie dans ma chambre.

translation.en: [Jed] Yeah, I forgot. That...
That was the craziest part. He would feed it, like a mother bird, you know...
translation.fr: C'était le plus dingue. Il la nourrissait comme une maman oiseau...

translation.en: Oh, masticate-- No, no, no. Premasticate.
-Yeah, premastication! -[man] Jed was a chronic masticater.
-[Jed] How'd you know? -[man] You can go blind doing that.
How long did you take care of the bird for, Owen?
translation.fr: Tu t'en es occupée longtemps, Owen ?

translation.en: Two or three months, until it was strong enough
translation.fr: Deux à trois mois, le temps qu'elle parvienne

translation.en: to go into Jed's room and eat his gerbil, I guess.
translation.fr: à atteindre la chambre de Jed et gober son hamster.

translation.en: But what happened to the hawk?
translation.fr: Et il est arrivé quoi à la buse ?

translation.en: We set it free.
Oh. Okay. [Porter] That reminds me.
translation.fr: - D'accord. - Ça me rappelle une chose.

translation.en: Remember when Colby fell in the Gowanus Canal?
translation.fr: Quand Colby est tombé dans le canal Gowanus.

translation.en: -Remember that day? -[Angelica] Oh, poor Colby.
[Porter] I threw the stick, -he didn't go for it... -[Angelica] So traumatizing.
translation.fr: Il ne rattrape pas le bâton, je me retourne et...

translation.en: [Adelaide] I told Jed I wouldn't marry him until they painted you in.
translation.fr: J'ai dit à Jed que je l'épouserai quand ils te peindront.

translation.en: Maybe that's why we haven't set a date yet.
translation.fr: Ça doit être pour ça qu'on n'a pas de date.

translation.en: They're gonna paint me in.
The artist just took a six-month sabbatical to Nepal, to study the light.
translation.fr: L'artiste a pris un congé sabbatique au Népal, pour étudier la lumière.

translation.en: I lost my job.
I'm sorry, Owen.
It's okay, I'll find a new one.
I'm actually thinking about becoming... a temporary volunteer husband.
translation.fr: Je songe à devenir mari bénévole temporaire.

translation.en: You're not serious.
Get rid of my lease, bounce from widow to widow.
translation.fr: Plus de bail, passant d'une veuve à l'autre.

translation.en: Do you ever notice that your plans always involve starting over...
translation.fr: T'as remarqué que tes plans impliquent toujours de redémarrer à zéro

translation.en: often with an entirely new identity?
translation.fr: et souvent sous une nouvelle identité ?

translation.en: It's a good fantasy.
[Angelica] Pudding's upstairs by the fireplace, everyone.
translation.fr: Le pudding est en haut près de la cheminée.

translation.en: Just to get through the post-dinner conversation.
Think about it.
Seriously...
as a hypothetical.
Say you and I left, right? Tonight.
translation.fr: Si toi et moi, on partait ? Ce soir.

translation.en: I got us passports, new identities.
translation.fr: Je peux nous avoir des passeports, de nouvelles identités.

translation.en: You steal all the money from Jed's bank account.
translation.fr: Tu voles l'argent du compte en banque de Jed.

translation.en: We just... do that.
We get a house in the middle of nowhere.
translation.fr: Une maison au milieu de nulle part.

translation.en: Start again.
Different people.
Are we a married couple?
We don't...
We can be, you know...
We don't have to be. We could be brother, or sister, or... friends.
translation.fr: Pas forcément. On peut être frère et sœur, ou amis.

translation.en: So... tonight, then, after dessert?
translation.fr: Alors... ce soir, après le dessert ?

translation.en: Yeah.
I'm serious. Let's do it.
You're fucking with me.
I got you.
You believed me.
This week's gonna be a living hell for me.
translation.fr: Cette semaine va être un enfer pour moi.

translation.en: He'll totally win.
He's not guilty. No chance of a conviction.
translation.fr: Il est innocent. Aucun risque de condamnation.

translation.en: It's all just so humiliating.
I mean, it's been going on for fucking ages,
all just for one day in court.
translation.fr: tout ça pour une journée au tribunal.

translation.en: Because he didn't do it, so...
translation.fr: Parce qu'il n'a rien fait, donc...

translation.en: You're positive?
Right? You were actually with him?
Yes.
[Phil] You would make that move.
-[man 1] What does that even mean? -[Phil] You would make that move. [man 2] That's the move--
translation.fr: - Passe aux actes. - Ça veut dire quoi ?

translation.en: Hey, Owen, you're not trying to sneak off, are you?
translation.fr: Owen, t'essaies de filer en douce ?

translation.en: No, Dad.
I need a second of your time before you leave.
translation.fr: Avant de partir, je dois te parler.

translation.en: Come on, boys, it's time.
[all] Balderdash!
-[Angelica] Owen, you're staying to play. -No, I-- I have to go.
translation.fr: Owen, tu restes jouer. Non, je dois y aller. Il faut...

translation.en: -I have something... -[Angelica] You love Balderdash.
No, I don't.
Come on, stay, it will be fun.
translation.fr: Allez, reste, ça va être amusant.

translation.en: I have a fundamental problem with Balderdash.
I gotta say, what a delicious meal that was.
So good, Mom. So good.
-You used to love Balderdash. -Mom, no, I didn't.
translation.fr: Tu adorais y jouer. - Non. - De la glace ?

translation.en: -[Jed] Who wants ice cream? -[children yelling]
translation.fr: - Non. - De la glace ? Oui, moi !

translation.en: -Who wants ice cream? Oh, you do? -I do!
translation.fr: - Qui veut de la glace ? Toi ? - Moi !

translation.en: Of course. But whoever's the quietest gets ice cream, I promise. Mom.
translation.fr: Bien sûr. Le plus silencieux aura de la glace, promis. Maman.

translation.en: Oh, are we playing Balderdash, or what?
So, um... [clears throat] I've been considering...
Considering leaving Roosevelt Island?
-No... -[Angelica] Oh, thank God.
So, have Hal help you find something closer.
translation.fr: Hal va t'aider à trouver plus près.

translation.en: -Oh, you moving closer? -[Owen] I'm not moving closer.
Crazy to think that every word did get invented.
translation.fr: C'est fou que chaque mot ait été inventé.

translation.en: I-- I have to go. Goodbye.
translation.fr: Je dois y aller. Au revoir.

translation.en: -Wait, you're not playing Balderdash? -No, I can't. Bye.
translation.fr: - Pas de Balderdash ? - Je peux pas. Salut.

translation.en: Oh, Owen, come on, you love Balderdash.
translation.fr: - T'adores Balderdash. - J'aime pas ce putain de Balderdash !

translation.en: No, I don't fucking love Balderdash! Balderdash is bullshit. [clears throat]
translation.fr: - T'adores Balderdash. - J'aime pas ce putain de Balderdash ! Balderdash, c'est merdique.

translation.en: -Jesus, Owen. -Is he off his meds?
translation.fr: - Bon sang, Owen. - Il a oublié ses médocs ?

translation.en: -[Belle cries] -I'll walk you to the station.
-[Phil] Don't worry about Uncle Owen. -Aggressive.
[Phil] He's a spaz. We're gonna get ice cream now.
translation.fr: Il est dérangé. Allons prendre de la glace.

translation.en: -[Porter] Is it a money crisis? -[Owen] No.
I know it's an expensive apartment to rent, but...
translation.fr: Ton appartement coûte cher à louer mais...

translation.en: Have you...? Have you thought about a...? A roommate?
translation.fr: t'as pensé à prendre un colocataire ?

translation.en: No.
I don't know why you won't let us just buy you a place.
translation.fr: Pourquoi refuser qu'on t'achète un logement ?

translation.en: That way you'd have more security.
Or you... You could come and work for the company.
translation.fr: Ou tu pourrais venir travailler pour la société.

translation.en: All your brothers do.
I already agreed, okay?
You don't need to buy me off.
Uh... I don't... I don't follow you. What--?
I will lie for Jed...
next week in court.
I get the expectation.
translation.fr: Je sais ce qu'on attend de moi.

translation.en: It's not an expectation, Owen, it's a gift.
translation.fr: On n'attend rien de toi, Owen, c'est un cadeau.

translation.en: You are giving your brother the gift of an alibi.
translation.fr: Tu offres à ton frère le cadeau d'un alibi.

translation.en: This woman is an opportunist. She sees an in.
translation.fr: Cette femme est une opportuniste. Elle a vu sa chance.

translation.en: [sighs] You're protecting him.
-You're protecting the family. -Right.
I know, I know, it sounds muddled, but that is the way reality works, Owen.
translation.fr: Je sais, ça paraît confus, mais la réalité fonctionne comme ça.

translation.en: -How's that, Dad? -[poop bot chatters]
With... With adjustments.
Just so you know, I got a new job.
translation.fr: Au fait, j'ai un nouveau boulot.

translation.en: Oh? What...? What job?
Business... marketing.
It involves travel, so I'll be gone a couple days next week,
translation.fr: Je pars en déplacement deux jours la semaine prochaine,

translation.en: but I'll be back in time for the trial.
translation.fr: mais je serai de retour pour le procès.

translation.en: don't worry if you can't reach me.
Someone invented a new kind of ham.
translation.fr: On sort un nouveau type de jambon.

translation.en: That's... That's wonderful, Owen.
That's-- That's-- That's great.
Milgrim men, we always come out on top.
translation.fr: Les hommes Milgrim, toujours au sommet.

translation.en: Anyway...
-All right. -[poop bot chatters]
-[dog whimpers] -[Porter] Hey, Colby, it's a Tristan 500.
-[poop bot] Cleaning in progress. -[Porter] No kicking and licking.
translation.fr: - Nettoyage en cours. - Reste tranquille. NETTOYAGE

translation.en: [woman over PA] Find the end of your rainbow
translation.fr: Trouvez la fin de votre arc-en-ciel

translation.en: at Neberdine Pharmaceutical and Biotech.
Psst, buddy. Which one are you here for?
It should be on the form right there.
It says, uh, U.L.P.
Me too.
That's a good one.
It's the big time.
Get ready to make a lot of fuckin' money.
[woman over PA] Carol Cuddy. Carol Cuddy, please report to D.M. test room three
translation.fr: Carol Cuddy. Salle de test numéro trois pour l'AEB phase 1.

translation.en: for A.E.B Phase I.
translation.fr: Carol Cuddy. Salle de test numéro trois pour l'AEB phase 1. PROTOCOLE - PHASE 3

translation.en: What do the bombs mean?
High-risk. That's where the dollars come from.
translation.fr: Risque élevé. Et des dollars à la clé.

translation.en: Apparently, they're havin' some kind of problem with this new drug.
translation.fr: Apparemment, ce nouveau médicament pose problème.

translation.en: -I think you should let me do it again. -Strong stuff. Very trippy shit.
translation.fr: - Je dois réessayer. - Du lourd. Super trippant.

translation.en: -[woman] Who's in charge of the red light? -That doesn't bother you?
translation.fr: Qui décide ? Ça ne te dérange pas ?

translation.en: -No. -I don't fucking understand.
-No risk, no reward. -I'm supposed to be part of the trial.
translation.fr: - Non. - Je devais participer. C'est le prix.

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -This is fucking bullshit.
[woman over PA] Jon Mallard, please report to D.M. test room one.
translation.fr: John Mallory, salle de test numéro un.

translation.en: Jon Mallard, please report to D.M. test room one for Rumi Phase III.
translation.fr: John Mallory, salle de test numéro un pour Rumi phase 3.

translation.en: [woman] Patricia. Patricia.
-[woman] I have to get into that study. -[second woman] Ma'am?
[woman] You have a daughter. Her name is Usnavy, and she goes to Hunter College.
translation.fr: Ta fille, Usnavy, est étudiante à la fac Hunter.

translation.en: [woman over PA] Owen Milgrim, please report to D.M. test room five.
translation.fr: Owen Milgrim, salle de test numéro cinq.

translation.en: Owen Milgrim, please report to D.M. test room five for U.L.P. screening.
translation.fr: Owen Milgrim, salle de test numéro cinq pour entretien du Protocole.

translation.en: Steven McDougal, please report to test room eight.
translation.fr: Steven McDougal, salle de test numéro huit.

translation.en: Steven McDougal, please report to test room eight for M.S. One Phase II.
translation.fr: Steven McDougal, salle de test numéro huit pour MS1 phase 2.

translation.en: [Owen] Unnecessary.
[woman] Try to answer with an emotion, rather than a description.
translation.fr: Répondez avec une émotion, plutôt qu'avec une description.

translation.en: Uh... calm.
[Owen] Justice.
-Is this personalized somehow? -[woman] No.
Focus on your answers.
-Suffocated. -[woman] Good.
Now, Mr. Milgrim...
please turn your attention to me
as I ask you this final question.
translation.fr: je vais poser la dernière question.

translation.en: Are you gonna ask it?
-Does that disqualify me? -[machine beeps]
Your defense mechanisms are fungible.
translation.fr: Vos mécanismes de défense sont fongibles.

translation.en: You've been accepted.
[woman over PA] Find the end of your rainbow
translation.fr: Trouvez la fin de votre arc-en-ciel

translation.en: at Neberdine Pharmaceutical and Biotech.
Stop looking at me.
Did...? Did you...?
Did you lose your husband recently?
translation.fr: Tu as perdu ton mari récemment ?

translation.en: Did you lose your husband recently?
translation.fr: Tu as perdu ton mari récemment ?

translation.en: No.
-[Owen] But I just saw... -Leave me alone.
Do you play golf in Hilton Head?
translation.fr: Tu joues au golf à Hilton Head ?

translation.en: I'll kill you.
I have a gun.
[Patricia over PA] Attention, please, all participants in the U.L.P. Phase III trial,
please look at your lanyards.
If you are an odd number, please line up at the intake corridor.
translation.fr: Chiffres impairs, alignez-vous dans le couloir des admissions.

translation.en: All even numbers will be next.
It's Jed.
No, it's Grimsson.
Mustache. No, don't say anything. Just be cool.
translation.fr: Moustache. Ne dis rien. Reste cool.

translation.en: The pattern is the pattern.
The pattern got you here.
Keep trusting the pattern.
She's your handler now.
She has a certain je ne sais quoi.
translation.fr: Elle a un je ne sais quoi.

translation.en: She's no Olivia, though.
Make contact with her. Use the code phrase.
translation.fr: Entre en contact. Utilise le code.

translation.en: [Patricia over PA] If you are an odd number,
please line up at the intake corridor.
translation.fr: alignez-vous dans le couloir des admissions.

translation.en: The pattern is the pattern. I know it doesn't make sense.
translation.fr: Le schéma, c'est le schéma. T'y comprends rien,

translation.en: It doesn't make sense to me either right now, but it will.
translation.fr: moi non plus. Mais ça viendra.

translation.en: Keep going forward.
Just reach out...
and make contact.
[Patricia over PA] All odd numbers, line up by the intake corridor.
translation.fr: Les chiffres impairs, en ligne dans le couloir des admissions.

translation.en: What the fuck is wrong with you?
Sorry.
Robert, wake up.
The odds are here.
Okay.
Let us complete this trial with none of the old problems, sir.
translation.fr: Finissons l'essai sans tous les anciens problèmes, monsieur.

translation.en: Yes, Dr. Fujita.
None of the old problems.
[orderly] As you enter the common room,
you will notice there are numbers on the pods.
translation.fr: repérez les numéros sur les capsules.

translation.en: The pod numbers correspond with the numbers on your lanyards.
translation.fr: Ils correspondent aux numéros sur vos badges.

translation.en: Please go to your pod.
That will be your home for the duration of your stay here with us.
translation.fr: C'est votre maison pour la durée de votre séjour avec nous.

translation.en: Leaving your pod at any unauthorized moment
will result in the termination of your stay here at this trial,
translation.fr: mettra un terme à votre participation à cette étude,

translation.en: as well as bringing shame and humiliation upon you.
translation.fr: et fera peser la honte et l'humiliation sur vous.

translation.en: Once you reach your pod, an orderly will approach
translation.fr: Une fois à votre capsule, un aide-soignant

translation.en: and begin to inspect your bag.
Once the orderly has inspected your bag, you will put your bag in your locker.
translation.fr: Une fois le sac inspecté, mettez-le dans votre casier.

translation.en: Once you have done that, make your way to this gentleman.
He will give you your uniform, as well as your patented Neberdine shoes,
translation.fr: Il vous donnera un uniforme et des chaussures Neberdine brevetées,

translation.en: which you cannot take with you at the end of the trial.
translation.fr: que vous ne pouvez pas emmener à la fin de l'étude.

translation.en: Once you have your uniforms and your shoes,
translation.fr: Muni de l'uniforme et des chaussures,

translation.en: you will make your way back to your pods,
then you will get in your pods and change clothes in your pods.
There will be no changing in the commons.
translation.fr: On ne se change pas dans la salle.

translation.en: Oh, my God!
[orderly] Condoms are contraband.
-Safety first. -[orderly] That's a red flag right there.
Intimacy in this facility is off-limits.
translation.fr: L'intimité dans cette structure est interdite.

translation.en: There will be no cohabitation inside the pods.
Once the curfew starts, lights go out.
You're not supposed to be here.
translation.fr: Tu n'es pas censée être là.

translation.en: Please.
What are my instructions?
The pattern is the pattern.
You're my contact. What are my instructions?
translation.fr: Tu es mon contact. Émets les instructions.

translation.en: [whispering] Please turn off the pattern. Please turn off...
-Owen. -[orderly] ..tight schedule.
We will tell you when there is mealtime.
Your instructions are to go back to your pod and await my signal.
translation.fr: Retourne à ta capsule et attends mon signal.

translation.en: [orderly] ...two Etch A Sketches and one Lite-Brite. Please don't fight over them.
translation.fr: On a deux télécrans et l'écran magique. Partagez.

translation.en: I'm going to save the world.
[orderly] We will tell you when there's recreation time.
Yes. You're gonna save the world.
translation.fr: - Oui. - ainsi que... - Tu sauveras le monde. - ...l'heure du coucher.

translation.en: [orderly] ...and we will tell you when to sleep.
translation.fr: - Tu sauveras le monde. - ...l'heure du coucher.

translation.en: -But not if you blow our cover. -[orderly] ...expecting. Thank you.
translation.fr: Sauf si tu ruines nos couvertures. ...vous voyez ? Merci.

translation.en: Is that working for you?
Okay, I understand.
[orderly] If you're having trouble getting into your pod,
translation.fr: Vous peinez à accéder à votre capsule ?

translation.en: there is also a little ladder underneath that will help you get into your pod.
translation.fr: Une petite échelle située en dessous vous y aidera.

translation.en: Also note, from here on in,
you will be referred to as the number on your lanyard. You are the Odds.
translation.fr: vous devenez le numéro de votre badge. Vous êtes les sujets impairs.

translation.en: Attention.
Please give your attention to Dr. Muramoto and Dr. Fujita.
translation.fr: Prêtez attention aux docteurs Muramoto et Fujita.

translation.en: They will be supervising your trials.
Welcome, subjects.
You made the right choice.
translation.fr: Vous avez pris la bonne décision.

translation.en: It's time to start your lives again.
translation.fr: C'est l'heure de recommencer vos vies.

translation.en: You don't fuck this up...
I won't fuck this up.
Just kidding.
